front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions in Support of Proactive Protection

abstract.t: This document describes protocol-specific procedures and extensions for Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Resource ReSerVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) signaling to support Label Switched Path (LSP) Proactive Protection, which create the protection LSP after a failure is predicted and before it becomes a real failure.
